name: tracesAPI
description: Get transaction traces and block trace data from 1inch Traces API. IMPORTANT: You MUST provide the 'endpoint' and 'chain' parameters. For 'Get synced interval for Ethereum', you MUST call this function with endpoint='getSyncedInterval' and chain=1. EXAMPLES: For synced interval: {"endpoint": "getSyncedInterval", "chain": 1}. For block trace: {"endpoint": "getBlockTraceByNumber", "chain": 1, "blockNumber": "15000000"}.

endpoint.description: REQUIRED: The traces API endpoint to call. Use 'getSyncedInterval' for synced interval requests, 'getBlockTraceByNumber' for block trace requests, 'getTransactionTraceByHash' for transaction trace by hash, 'getTransactionTraceByOffset' for transaction trace by position.

chain.description: REQUIRED: Chain ID: 1 for Ethereum, 137 for Polygon, etc.

blockNumber.description: Block number (required for getBlockTraceByNumber, getTransactionTraceByHash, getTransactionTraceByOffset)

offset.description: Transaction position in block (required for getTransactionTraceByOffset)
